subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer broke out of his slump with 27 points, leading the host Utah Jazz to a 104-99 victory against Los Angeles and cutting the Lakers’ lead in the series to 2-1.
snippet: Carlos Boozer broke out of his slump with 27 points, leading the host Utah Jazz to a 104-99 victory against Los Angeles and cutting the Lakers’ lead in the series to 2-1.
